segments.text: I'm just watching the woman, still polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely in her own world, focused on her chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm routine she represents is almost infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she hear the running water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Can she not feel the huge puddle spreading around her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring out of the sink, right onto her cabinet doors!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, just behind her, plotting their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious to the water and completely unaware of the kids' antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of detachment from her immediate surroundings is astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me genuinely quite angry to see such a clear oversight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to pay attention to what's going on in her own kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to alert her to the imminent chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her calm demeanor is really getting on my nerves given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR
